subject_info:
Name: prenylcysteine oxidase activity
Definition: Catalysis of the reaction: S-prenyl-L-cysteine + O2 + H2O = a prenal + L-cysteine + H2O2.

subject_info:
Name: retinal dehydrogenase activity
Definition: Catalysis of the reaction: retinal + NAD+ + H2O = retinoate + NADH. Acts on both 11-trans and 13-cis forms of retinal.
